item.title: 阿联酋人工智能部长称马斯克的 Boring 公司将于明年开通 "迪拜环路
item.description: 据一位阿联酋官员称，迪拜的乘客最快明年就能乘坐埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的地下交通系统。【原文：Commuters in Dubai will be able to ride in Elon Musk’s underground transit system as soon as next year, according to an Emirati official.】

item.title: 北欧贷款机构汉德森银行和丹斯克银行推出国防基金
item.description: 斯堪的纳维亚银行斯文斯卡银行（Svenska Handelsbanken AB）和丹斯克银行（Danske Bank A/S）分别推出了专注于国防和安全领域的新股票基金，凸显出该地区的投资者正在寻求从欧洲的军事和战备建设中获利。【原文：Scandinavian banks Svenska Handelsbanken AB and Danske Bank A/S have separately launched new equity funds focused on defense and security, underscoring how investors in the region are seeking to profit from Europe’s military and preparedness buildup.】

item.title: 澳大利亚证券和投资委员会称澳大利亚养老金在退休指导方面存在不足
item.description: 据一家重要监管机构的报告称，在数百万人准备离开劳动力市场之际，澳大利亚的养老基金并没有为会员提供足够的指导和信息，以帮助他们自信地退休。【原文：Australia’s pension funds aren’t providing members with enough guidance and information to help them retire confidently as millions prepare to leave the workforce, according to a report from a key regulator.】

item.title: OpenAI 与 Broadcom 签订 10 千兆瓦芯片和网络协议
item.description: OpenAI 与博通公司（Broadcom Inc. ）签署了一项多年期协议，双方将在定制芯片和网络设备方面展开合作，这标志着这家人工智能初创公司在增加计算基础设施的宏伟计划中迈出了最新的一步。博通公司股价跳涨。【原文：OpenAI signed a multiyear agreement with Broadcom Inc. to collaborate on custom chips and networking equipment, marking the latest step in the AI startup’s ambitious plan to add computing infrastructure. Broadcom shares jumped.】

item.title: 美光新晋大牛有望在内存超级周期中实现 50% 的收益
item.description: 美光科技公司（Micron Technology Inc. ）最大的怀疑者已成为其最大的拥护者，称这家芯片制造商正处于人工智能 "内存超级周期 "的早期阶段，这将推动该公司股价取得更大的涨幅。【原文：Micron Technology Inc.’s biggest skeptic has become its biggest advocate, saying the chipmaker is in the early stages of an artificial intelligence “memory supercycle” that will drive even more gains for the stock.】

item.title: 英国央行行长格林建议因价格担忧将利率维持至 2026 年
item.description: 英国央行决策者梅根-格林（Megan Greene）表示，她正在考虑至少在明年 3 月之前维持利率不变，因为她担心政策的限制性不足以挤出挥之不去的价格压力。【原文：Bank of England policymaker Megan Greene signalled that she is considering holding interest rates until at least March next year on concerns that policy is not restrictive enough to squeeze out lingering price pressures.】

item.title: 塞内加尔在超额认购的地区债券销售中筹资 7.95 亿美元
item.description: 塞内加尔在一家地区性交易所出售债券，筹集了 4,500 亿非洲法郎（7.95 亿美元），政府正在努力应对隐性债务丑闻限制其进入国际资本市场后的资金挑战。【原文：Senegal raised 450 billion CFA francs ($795 million) selling bonds on a regional exchange, as the government grapples with funding challenges after a hidden-debt scandal constrained its access to international capital markets.】

item.title: Bloom Energy 股价因 50 亿美元的 Brookfield AI 合作伙伴关系而飙升
item.description: 由于布鲁克菲尔德公司（Brookfield Corp）同意投资高达 50 亿美元，在运行人工智能的新数据中心部署该公司的燃料电池，布鲁姆能源公司（Bloom Energy Corp.【原文：Shares of Bloom Energy Corp. soared as much as 36% in premarket trading as Brookfield Corp. agreed to invest up to $5 billion to deploy the company’s fuel cells at new data centers that operate artificial intelligence.】

item.title: 欧佩克 9 月大幅增产后保持石油前景不变
item.description: 欧佩克维持其对石油市场的展望不变，而该组织及其合作伙伴 9 月份的原油日产量增加了 50 多万桶。【原文：OPEC kept its outlook for the oil market unchanged, while the group and its partners increased crude production by more than half a million barrels a day in September.】

item.title: 委内瑞拉转向俄罗斯购买曾从美国购买的石油产品
item.description: 随着华盛顿的贸易政策推动这两个受制裁国家加深经济合作，俄罗斯已取代美国成为委内瑞拉石脑油的主要来源国，而委内瑞拉需要石脑油这种石油产品来稀释其超重原油。【原文：Russia has unseated the US as Venezuela’s primary source of naphtha, a petroleum product it needs to dilute its extra-heavy crude, as Washington’s trade policies push the two sanctioned countries into deeper economic cooperation.】

item.title: 亚马逊力争在假日季招聘 25 万名员工，与 2024 年持平
item.description: 亚马逊公司（Amazon.com Inc. ）计划在旺季招聘 25 万名员工；与前两年持平；这使得这家在线零售商在原本黯淡的假日劳动力市场中脱颖而出。【原文：Amazon.com Inc. plans to hire 250,000 workers during its peak season — unchanged from the previous two years — making the online retailer a standout in an otherwise bleak holiday labor market.】

item.title: 美国生命线为阿根廷赢得时间，投资者敦促外汇改革
item.description: 来自美国的 200 亿美元救命钱几乎肯定会使阿根廷总统哈维尔-米莱（Javier Milei）在本月关键的中期选举前夕避免陷入货币危机。【原文：A $20 billion lifeline from the US is almost certain to keep Argentina President Javier Milei from being engulfed by a currency crisis in the runup to key mid-term elections this month.】

item.title: 柴油门丑闻十年后，汽车制造商面临英国大规模审判
item.description: 包括梅赛德斯-奔驰集团、福特汽车公司和雷诺汽车公司在内的汽车制造商正面临着一场大规模的集体诉讼式审判，因为约有 160 万英国车主要求对操纵车辆在排放测试中作弊的行为进行赔偿。【原文：Car manufacturers including Mercedes-Benz Group AG, Ford Motor Co. and Renault SA are facing a mass class-action style trial after about 1.6 million British car owners claimed compensation for the manipulation of their vehicles to cheat on emission tests.】

item.title: Technip Energies 首席执行官称美国液化天然气项目可避开中国船厂
item.description: Technip Energies NV 首席执行官 Arnaud Pieton 表示，美国液化天然气出口终端的建设者可以依靠亚洲和中东其他地区的堆场，避免中国制造设备的关税不确定性。【原文：Technip Energies NV Chief Executive Officer Arnaud Pieton said that builders of US liquefied natural gas export terminals can avoid tariff uncertainty on Chinese-made equipment by relying on yards elsewhere in Asia and the Middle East.】

item.title: 美国电力需求激增，公用事业公司面临艰难抉择
item.description:
公司必须在不导致客户账单激增的情况下投资新产能。【原文：

Companies must invest in new capacity without causing a surge in customer bills.

】

item.title: 美国垃圾债券创六个月来最大跌幅，利差扩大
item.description: 周五，美国垃圾债券涨势戛然而止，创下六个月来最大单日跌幅，风险溢价飙升至接近四个月来的峰值 304 个基点。收益率攀升至 6.99%，为两个多月来最高。【原文：The US junk bond rally came to a halt on Friday with the biggest one-day loss in six months, as the risk premium surged to near a four-month peak of 304 basis points. Yields climbed to 6.99%, the highest in more than two months.】

item.title: 教皇敦促警惕谁在控制人工智能
item.description: 欢迎阅读 Tech In Depth，这是彭博社全球记者关于科技商业的每日时事通讯。今天，奥斯汀-卡尔（Austin Carr）撰文探讨天主教会对人工智能的看法，因为人工智能技术已渗透到现代生活的方方面面。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our daily newsletter about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Austin Carr writes about the Catholic Church’s perspective on AI, as the technology proliferates through every aspect of modern life.】

item.title: 法国新老总理仍需预算

item.title: 特朗普关税在 "第一品牌 "事件中的作用表明经济损失正在缓慢显现
item.description: 本周举行的国际货币基金组织和世界银行年会将确认一种新的观点，即全球经济迄今为止避免了今年早些时候许多人预计的最严重的关税痛苦。【原文：The emerging view set to be confirmed at this week’s annual meetings of the International Monetary Fund and World Bank is that the global economy has so far avoided the worst of the tariff pain many anticipated earlier this year.】

item.title: 特朗普与习近平再次引发对峙，世界经济岌岌可危
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普和中国领导人习近平最近一次针锋相对的对决于周一陷入僵局，两国都声称球现在在对方的球场上。【原文：US President Donald Trump and Chinese leader Xi Jinping’s latest tit-for-tat showdown reached a standoff on Monday, with both countries claiming the ball was now in the other’s court.】

item.title: 智利预算预测显示勒紧裤腰带计划失败
item.description: 智利政府本月早些时候上调了对今年财政赤字的估计。经济学家们警告说，这还不够完全现实。【原文：Chile’s government whacked up its estimate for this year’s fiscal deficit earlier this month. Economists are warning it’s still not enough to be totally realistic.】

item.title: 特朗普威胁再现，投资者面临不平静的三周
item.description:
投资者一直在寻找卖出的理由。周五，唐纳德-特朗普给了他们一个理由。【原文：

item.title: 印度通胀率再次低于印度央行的目标，推动了降息押注
item.description: 印度的通货膨胀率今年第二次低于央行的目标范围，这加强了降息的理由，因为经济增长面临着美国对印度商品征收高额关税的压力。【原文：India’s inflation eased below the central bank’s target range for the second time this year, strengthening the case for an interest rate cut as economic growth faces pressure from high US tariffs on Indian goods.】

item.title: 甲骨文事件是展示 3,700 亿美元股票涨势的机会
item.description: 甲骨文公司（Oracle Corp. ）本周将有机会向投资者保证，今年以来市值增加约 3,700 亿美元的涨势已经站稳了脚跟。【原文：Oracle Corp. will get a chance this week to reassure investors that a rally which has added roughly $370 billion to its market value this year is on stable footing.】

item.title: 分析师盈利情绪减弱，股票定价接近完美
item.description: 在美股接近历史高点之际，股票分析师对企业利润的看法正在失去动力，这表明本财报季的涨势可能会面临减速。【原文：Equity analyst sentiment toward corporate profits is losing momentum at a time when US stocks are trading near record highs, suggesting the rally could face speed bumps this earnings season.】

item.title: 埃克森称欧盟企业正在撤退，特朗普的态度 "平衡
item.description: 埃克森美孚公司（Exxon Mobil Corp.埃克森美孚公司首席执行官达伦-伍兹（Darren Woods）再次批评了欧盟主要的气候和人权立法，并将欧洲大陆的能源战略与美国总统唐纳德-特朗普政府主导的 "平衡 "对话进行了对比。【原文：Exxon Mobil Corp. Chief Executive Officer Darren Woods renewed criticism of key European Union climate and human rights legislation and contrasted the continent’s energy strategy with the “balanced” conversation being led by US President Donald Trump’s administration.】

item.title: 华兴资本为 BNB Crypto Treasury 寻求 6 亿美元投资
item.description: 华兴资本控股有限公司（China Renaissance Holdings Ltd.）是一家总部位于北京的中国投资银行，其前董事长包凡于 8 月份被释放。【原文：China Renaissance Holdings Ltd., the Beijing-based Chinese investment bank whose former chairman Bao Fan was released from detention in August, is in talks to raise about $600 million for a public vehicle that would invest in a cryptocurrency with close ties to Binance Holdings Ltd.】

item.title: 大银行盈利填补政府停摆期间的 "数据真空
item.description: 本周，华尔街最大银行的财报将受到比往常更严格的审查，因为美国政府的停摆让投资者迫切希望对经济有一个新的解读。【原文：The earnings reports from Wall Street’s biggest banks are poised to get even more scrutiny than usual this week, as the US government shutdown leaves investors desperate for a fresh read on the economy.】
